body.p: Which of the following best describes the role of an IP address?

multiple_choice.choice: Prioritize which computer has access to the network.
Identify a computer on a network.
Encrypt all packets before they are sent.

response.feedback: You need more than the IP address to identify a web page.
The IP address is part of networking but is not part of prioritization.
The IP address, much like a street address, identifies a computer to send and receive packets.
The IP address is part of networking but generally not part of encryption.
